body:
Hello,
 Today I came here with a 'mini game' called THE PERFECT SKIN *dan dan daaaan*
Well, how to play it? I am not going to make the skin x) by the way... but you have to complete:
It would fit Alex or Steve?:
Explain and describe your perfect skin:
(optional)Have you done it? Show it to us!:

One... two... three.... Go go go go go!

title: The perfect skin. [Mini Game]

replies.body:
Oh, no! I was forgetting mine x) Sorry! :P Here we go....
It would fit Alex or Steve?: Alex. 
Explain and describe your perfect skin: Alexanderjoe10's skin with blond hair.
(optional)Have you done it? Show it to us!: Yes, I've done it.

replies.body: Oh my Steve. I like Steve more than Alex to be honest... when are you changing it into Alex's (1.8) skin?
